comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I closed a tab, press ⌘Z instead of ⇧⌘T 


Actual results:

nothing happened


Expected results:

reopen last closed tab

nothing happened

reopen last closed tab

comments.creator: zhaochao0726@gmail.com
comments.text: The Command + Z is more easy than Shift + Command + T.
